profile.description:
At the beginning of 2023 I decided to change my life and professional direction and embarked on a professional certificate focused on full-stack tools and languages.
During this last year I demonstrated my ability to face challenges and acquire new knowledge.
Now I am looking for my first professional challenge to put into practice what I have learned in a real environment.

Experience1.jobDescription:
Immersed in a course focused on digital protection:
Identification and management of digital threats, safeguarding online information, and preventing identity theft.
Advanced use of anonymity tools and security protocols in networks.
Mastery of Kali Linux, comprehensive vulnerability analysis, and user/password management.
Continuous training in Python programming skills, exploring offensive and defensive strategies in cybersecurity.

Experience2.jobDescription:
After completing the Professional Certification, I'm participating in an internship program, where I am actively applying and improving my acquired knowledge in a real environment.
At Onets, I'm collaborating and using my competence in various programming languages and tools such as HTML5, CSS3 (including Bootstrap 5 and Tailwind 3), JavaScript ES6 (including Node.js and React), MySQL 8, and others.
This practical experience not only enhances my technical skills but also provides valuable insights into industry practices and team dynamics.
These internships are essential to reinforce my knowledge and progress towards my professional goals.

Experience3.jobTitle: Professional Certification in Computer Systems Programming
Experience3.jobDescription:
Participating in a Professional Certification focused on Full-Stack development covering a variety of languages, libraries, frameworks, and other development tools such as HTML 5; CSS 3, including Bootstrap 5 and Tailwind 3; JavaScript 6, including Node.js and React; MySQL 8, and Python among others.
Daily application of these skills in personal and academic projects, enriching my technical competence and acquiring valuable skills for my future professional and personal aspirations.

Experience4.jobTitle: Content Analyst, Data Entry and User Accounts Support
Experience4.jobDescription: In this role, I reviewed user-generated content and took measures to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience. Assisted users in recovering their accounts, providing empathetic support and ensuring the security of their data through meticulous identity verification processes.

Experience5.jobDescription: Carefully prepared ingredients and cooked delicious dishes, managed inventory, and maintained a pristine kitchen, ensuring top-quality service.

Experience6.jobDescription: Developed culinary skills, carefully preparing dishes and providing exceptional service to ensure customer satisfaction.

Experience7.jobDescription: Honed culinary skills, preparing ingredients and dishes that left a lasting impression on diners. Provided personalized service and maintained a clean and welcoming dining space.

Experience8.jobDescription: Built meaningful connections with customers, providing personalized assistance, and ensuring an enjoyable and efficient shopping experience.

Experience9.jobDescription: Provided friendly and reliable transportation services, ensuring passengers' safety and comfort during their journeys across the vibrant city of Madrid.
